name: You're keeping us apart, Lisa
description:
via" class="redactor-linkify-object">https://giphy.com/gifs/theroom-the-room-tommy-wiseau-3o751ZGnnh1aRKf34Q">via GIPHY

You've just held a party for your fiance but his former best friend who you have been dating turns up at the part. try to keep them seperated. 

Drag around cubes and use special items to stop them from coming together.  each character must spend at least 45 seconds in their side of the room to clear the level.

Controls

Boxes and the yellow ball can be dragged around using the mouse.
